availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George O. R. McCall (Mount Vernon, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Mount Vernon, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Joplien McCall. Father of Mary E. McCall, Ann McCall, Susan McCall, and James McCall. Farmer in Mount Vernon in 1860.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, Mt. Vernon, p. 125; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, Voting District 1, p. 43; Find A Grave, "George O. R. McCall (1831-1905)," Memorial #39758587, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=39758587 (accessed August 10, 2017).
